item.title: Local Context: San Diego and Solar
item.description: Opening Cities will be crucial in leading innovation, policy change, and enacting ambitious legislation set force by policies such as the Inflation Reduction Act. In this article, I examine how San Diego has performed in adding renewable energy to the grid via solar highlighting pertinent trends and differences. Please play with this Tableau dashboard I put together to power this analysis drawing upon San Diego solar data and ACS community information.
